statements: UPDATE research_publications SET title='New Title', citation_count=50 WHERE publication_id='45c094c7-6e66-4fc8-9cf7-d7ad56129e0b';
UPDATE research_publications SET authors=['Author A', 'Author B'], topic='New Topic' WHERE publication_id='d099f7e3-842a-463b-af16-91c6cdd12e2c';

UPDATE research_publications SET title = 'New Title', authors = ARRAY['John Doe', 'Jane Smith'], publication_date = '2022-01-15', citation_count = 100, topic = 'Machine Learning' WHERE publication_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';

UPDATE research_publications SET citation_count = 150, topic = 'Data Analysis', publication_date = '2021-10-20', title = 'Updated Research Paper', authors = ARRAY['Alice Brown', 'Bob White'] WHERE publication_id = '98765432-abcdef-4567-ijkl-890123456789';
UPDATE research_publications SET title = 'New Title 1', citation_count = 10 WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE publication_citations SET cited_by = 'Author 1, Author 2', citing_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE citation_id = 3;
UPDATE research_publications SET title = 'New Title 1', citation_count = 10 WHERE publication_id = 123;
UPDATE publication_citations SET cited_by = 'Author X', citing_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE citation_id = 456;
UPDATE research_publications SET title = 'New Title', citation_count = 10 WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_citations SET citation_date = '2022-01-01', citing_publication_id = 2 WHERE citation_id = 1;
UPDATE research_publications SET citation_count = citation_count + 1, publication_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET organization = 'University of Science', research_interests = 'Machine Learning, Data Science' WHERE researcher_id = 3;
UPDATE ResearchPublications SET publication_title = 'New Title', publication_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE Citations SET citation_text = 'Updated Citation Text', citation_date = '2022-06-20' WHERE citation_id = 3;
UPDATE ResearchPublications SET publication_abstract = 'New abstract text' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE Authors SET author_email = 'newemail@example.com', author_affiliation = 'New affiliation' WHERE author_id = 2;
UPDATE Research_Papers SET publication_year = 2021 WHERE paper_id = 1;
UPDATE Research_Papers SET keywords = 'Machine Learning, Data Mining' WHERE paper_id = 2;
UPDATE Research_Papers SET authors = 'John Doe, Jane Smith' WHERE paper_id = 1
UPDATE Citations SET citation_text = 'This paper has been cited in several other research works' WHERE citation_id = 2
